txt.en: 'You did not know him as long as we, but you proved yourself a stouthearted friend to Kafli.\n\n'It will be through the noble actions of people like yourself, willing to both fight for the future and respect the traditions of the past, that the glory of Khazad-dûm will once more be sung throughout the world!'
In His Memory

'Ah, I remember Kafli well. He will be missed... when we were but little dwarves together, I remember once he hid from me a gem I'd mined myself, with my own little pick, which I prized above all my other possessions, until I apologized to another child that I had insulted. I took years to fully forgive him....'
'Let us all salute Kafli! To the memory of the bravest dwarf I know!'

You should find and drink from the tankard at Kúli's camp.\n\nKúli wants you to speak with Kafli's friends in each of the dwarf-outposts throughout Moria, telling them of his death and hoisting a memorial tankard in his name with them each.
'Kafli's passing will be long mourned, and his life's story sung until I too pass, or may my beard be cut from my face.'

You should find and drink from the tankard in Anazârmekhem.\n\nKúli wants you to speak with Kafli's friends in each of the dwarf-outposts throughout Moria, telling them of his death and hoisting a memorial tankard in his name with them each.
'O, what a grievous day! I am moved... I shall write an epic ode to the memory of Kafli!'

You should find and drink from the tankard in the Rotting Cellar.\n\nKúli wants you to speak with Kafli's friends in each of the dwarf-outposts throughout Moria, telling them of his death and hoisting a memorial tankard in his name with them each.
'Ho there, [placeholder]! Raise a glass to my fallen cousin!'

You should find and drink from the tankard in the Chamber of the Cross-roads.\n\nKúli wants you to speak with Kafli's friends in each of the dwarf-outposts throughout Moria, telling them of his death and hoisting a memorial tankard in his name with them each.
'Kafli died as he lived, brave and faithful to the lovely Finna. May all of us find in our lives the happiness theirs held!'

You should find and drink from the tankard in the Shadowed Refuge.\n\nKúli wants you to speak with Kafli's friends in each of the dwarf-outposts throughout Moria, telling them of his death and hoisting a memorial tankard in his name with them each.

'Poor Finna! I pity the messenger who delivers this news. I don't suppose you're going to the Lonely Mountain...? No, that would have been too easy, I suppose. Ah, well. To Kafli! Let us hoist a tankard in his memory!'
'I met him in passing several times. He was a good craftsman... he could hoist a tankard with the best of us.'

You should find and drink from the tankard in Dolven-view.\n\nKúli wants you to speak with Kafli's friends in each of the dwarf-outposts throughout Moria, telling them of his death and hoisting a memorial tankard in his name with them each.
'I grieve to hear your tidings, [placeholder]. What tragic news to have to spread!'

You should find and drink from the tankard in the Deep Descent.\n\nKúli wants you to speak with Kafli's friends in each of the dwarf-outposts throughout Moria, telling them of his death and hoisting a memorial tankard in his name with them each.

You should find and drink from the tankard in the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nKúli wants you to speak with Kafli's friends in each of the dwarf-outposts throughout Moria, telling them of his death and hoisting a memorial tankard in his name with them each.
Kúli can be found north of the grodbog-hive in the Redhorn Lodes.\n\nHaving muddled your wits with Kafli's friends all over Moria, you ought to return to Kúli, his kinsman.

'Poor Finna! I pity the messenger who delivers this news. I don't suppose you're going to the Lonely Mountain...? No, that would have been too easy, I suppose. Ah, well. To Kafli! Let us hoist a tankard in his memory!'
'Kafli is dead? What woe! This is a sad day indeed. Never again shall he and I quaff my son's good ale together!'
Drink to Kafli's memory in Kúli's camp
Drink to Kafli's memory in Anazârmekhem
Drink to Kafli's memory in the Rotting Cellar
Drink to Kafli's memory in the Chamber of the Cross-roads
Drink to Kafli's memory in the Shadowed Refuge
Drink to Kafli's memory in Dolven-view
Drink to Kafli's memory in the Deep Descent
Drink to Kafli's memory in the Twenty-first Hall
Talk to Kúli camped near the grodbog-hive
Kúli wants Kafli's death to be reported and celebrated in the true dwarf-fashion.

'[placeholder], Kafli's passing is a cause for great grief. I can think of only one way to properly celebrate his life, and death, in correct accordance with our most ancient and venerable dwarf-traditions.\n\n'Kafli was friends with many on this expedition, and they are stationed from the Hollin Gate to the ruins of the Bridge of Khazad-dûm. Will you honour Kafli's memory with them, by quaffing a good ale with each of them where they are staying at most of the major encampments of my people throughout the Mines?'
